wrongPasswordFormat: Wrong password format: minimum 8-character password, with at least a symbol (!,@,#,$,%,^,&,*), upper and lower case letters, and a number.
passwordIsTooSimilarToUsername: The password is too similar to the username.
phoneNumberIsNotValid: The phone number entered is not valid.
ifYouBelongToPlantingOrganization: If you belong to the planting organisation that already uses this platform, ask your coordinator for a unique link to create an account.
linkIsIncorrectAskManagerForNewOne: Link is incorrect, ask manager for a new one or log in as an individual user
enterValidUsername: Enter a valid username. This value may contain only letters, numbers, and @/./+/-/_ characters.
